game.name: Hover Racer Pro
game.description:
This time you do not have car to ride, but a spaceship to drive in the sky! The challenge is very big and intense! Will you still try to out this tricky challenge? Join Hover Racer Pro and be prepared to control a hover ship at high speed in a completely unique environment! Be careful as the entire environment is filled with the amazing different coloured ramps! Make some cool stunts and jumps and try to be on the tallest ramp to score big.

When you are doing it, do not forget to keep your eyes on your health status. Remember your ship can be destroyed if you take your eyes off the health indicator. Drive different hover ships at insane speeds, make some death-defying stunts, earn some points and prove the world that you are the best racer in this 3D racing game. Challenge some nice driving skills, use the speed booster and reach on the top of the ramps as fast as you can!

This free online HTML5 race game features 6 unique and different hover ships to play with, 1 map with plenty of ramps to explore, and several configurations to suit your play style. Do not forget to use the pink area to regenerate your health and boost your speed. Check out even more challenging free racing games and enjoy online without download on the multiple platforms including web browser! Stay connected with atmegame.com to have a blast with your friends and families by exploring new driving simulators every day!
